projects.name: Arbitrary-Precision Calculator (C)
highlights: Implemented a bc command-like tool in C capable of handling very large numbers, using custom user-defined data structures.

Supported operations: addition, multiplication, subtraction, sdivision, exponentiation, negatives, and infix expression evaluation.
